query:
INSERT INTO chats (user_a, user_b)
        VALUES (
            LEAST(
              (SELECT user_id FROM devices WHERE id=$1),
              (SELECT user_id FROM devices WHERE id=$2)
            ),
            GREATEST(
              (SELECT user_id FROM devices WHERE id=$1),
              (SELECT user_id FROM devices WHERE id=$2)
            )
        )
        RETURNING id
